data.text:
@globalhlthtwit People under 40 have a much higher risk of myocarditis from the mRNA vaccine. You can also look at the skyrocketing incidence of myocarditis since the roll out, plus all the collapsing and dying athletes, plus so many people now dying in their sleep.

https://t.co/CQwSp5wfN7 https://t.co/jSWBlMvK8n

@globalhlthtwit Why are you trivialising and normalising heart damage in young people?  Is this why post-jab, football players are dropping dead on the pitch, children are not waking up from their sleep and defibrillators are being installed everywhere?   "Almost all" is telling. Mild is a lie.

@globalhlthtwit Assuming those numbers are not overinflated by mathematical modelling or including MIS after vaccine, for a risk v benefit analysis, it would be critical to compare this with the risk of MIS from vaccine, given the pathogenic spike protein is in both virus and jab. @MaidmentRos
@globalhlthtwit How 'almost 0%'?  Has there been low take up for 5-11s deemed vulnerable?

@globalhlthtwit Ongoing phase 2-3 trial vaccinated 1517 children with a median follow-up of only 2.3 months before data cutoff! Delaying for children in UK gives us the benefit of seeing the concerning safety signals coming from countries that rolled out early, as sad as that is. @MaidmentRos
@globalhlthtwit With what if any underlying conditions? And from covid or with covid?

@globalhlthtwit Again, are any of these children vaccinated? Without knowing this, it is difficult to interpret the data.  And I don't just mean by vaccination status as people are being classed as unvaccinated up to 2 weeks after injection. Is it possible any of these are within that window?
